subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Two weeks after the death of his father, and one week after taking bereavement leave from the Knicks for the second time, Stephon Marbury practiced with the team and will play Monday.
snippet: Two weeks after the death of his father, and one week after taking bereavement leave from the Knicks for the second time, Stephon Marbury practiced with the team and will play Monday.
